publication/authors: Ji Z, Zhou W, Hou W, Ji H
publication/title: Single-cell ATAC-seq signal extraction and enhancement with SCATE.
dataset/provenance: Parking and GFP-TFEB images generated in the same study
dataset/splits: Training 80%, validation 15%, 5% Independent test data. N_pos and N_neg unknown for training data. For independent data: N_pos=5401, N_neg=4948.
optimization/algorithm: SVM and Convolutional Neural Network (ImageNet architecture)
optimization/config: Some hyperparameters specified in the main text
optimization/encoding: 150x150 pixel images (CNN). Image descrptors for SVM
optimization/features: f=3 (pixel intensities) for CNN. f=3 for SVM (descriptors selected after PCA-based feature selection)
optimization/fitting: Early stopping used to prevent overfitting (CNN)
